metadata.name: Distress
metadata.description:
Searching for the unique ability to evoke strong emotions in its viewers. Whether it be through the use of color, composition, or subject matter, art has the power to transport us to different emotional states and allow us to connect with the artist's experiences and perspective. The "Art of Emotions" collection showcases this connection, offering viewers the chance to explore and connect with their own emotions through the artworks on display. 

Each piece in this collection has been carefully selected for its ability to stir the emotions and inspire introspection. From the bright, bold and vibrant abstract geometry to the contemplative gaze of a portrait, the "Art of Emotions" collection invites viewers on a journey of self-discovery through the power of art.
